charges.charge_description: 21:841A=CD.F CONTROLLED SUB-SELL,DISTRIBUTE,OR DISPENSE and Title 18: Section 2 (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant moves to withdraw plea agreement as to Count 11 of indictment and pleads guilty to Count 12. Court grants motion and accepts guilty plea as to Count 12. Court accepts plea and sentences defendant to custody of Bureau of Prisons and Attorney General for 70 months, followed by 6 years supervised release with standard conditions of release plus: defendant to commit no other state, federal crimes; defendant to possess no firearm or other dangerous device; defendant not to possess or use any controlled substance; defendant to undergo random drug testing if oredered by Probation; defendant to seek, maintain full time employment; defendant to submit to reasonable search of person, residence, vehicle by Probation. Court imposes $500 fine on Count 12 and waives fine as to all other counts. Once on supervised release, defendant to make timely installments of $25 a month. Court imposes mandatory $50 special assessment on each count. Court recommends that defendant receive most drug treatment as is available and further recommends that he receive treatment at the Lexington, Kentucky facility. Defendant allowed to voluntarily surrender. (1)
